movies.title: Child of Resistance
movies.plot: A woman dressed in a robe, hands bound, is being transported through a barroom into a jail cell, directly outside of which later appears a jury box filled with jurors. Linearity is rejected as space is treated poetically, following the coordinates of a propulsive social idea - the social imprisonment of black women.
movies.simplePlot: A woman dressed in a robe, hands bound, is being transported through a barroom into a jail cell, directly outside of which later appears a jury box filled with jurors. Linearity is rejected...

biography.bio: Barbarao is known for her work on Daughters of the Dust (1991), Maangamizi: The Ancient One (2001) and Demon Seed (1977).
biography.name: Barbarao
